14032.「私は けがれの渦の 動きを封じる！\n お前は ヤツの息の根を 止めるのだ！:
I will hold the vortex in place! You must
strike down the Reaper's Breath at its source!

14033.「我は死……。\n 生きとし生けるもの すべての死。: I am death... the death of all living things.

14034.「お前たちの身体を使って\n 我は 世に まいもどるとしよう……。\n さあ 死:
I will use your bodies to carry my plague
across the world... now, die...

14036.「私は けがれの渦の 動きを封じる！\n お前は 今度こそ\n ヤツの息の根を:
I will hold the vortex in place! This time for
sure, you must strike down the Reaper's Breath
at its source!

14037.「運よく 我が手を逃れながら \n ふたたび 戻るとは 愚かなり。:
You are a fool to return after escaping my
grasp before.

14038.「お前たちの身体を使って\n 我は 世に まいもどるとしよう……。\n さあ 死:
I will use your bodies to carry my plague
across the world... now, die...

14040.「これで…… 死神の息吹を 滅ぼせたのだな。\n よく やってくれた……。:
At last... the Reaper's Breath is no more.
You have done well...

14041.「出会った時から わかっていた。\n お前は 人とはちがう\n 特別なチカラを持:
I knew from the moment I met you. You were
different from the others, that you had a
special power...

14042.「……<cs_pchero>。\n なぜ 大僧侶キリカは 閃香樹で\n エルドナ:
...<cs_pchero>. Why do you suppose that
High Priest Kirika made the idol of Eldona
out of Senka wood?

14043.「私は 思うのだ……。大僧侶キリカは \n お前のような者が 現れると信じ\n:
I think... that High Priest Kirika wanted to
entrust that idol to the future, believing
that someone like you would appear.

14044.「そうして 教えたかったのかもしれない。\n 本当の神の心を。僧侶のあるべき姿を:
Perhaps it was a way of teaching us. The true
will of the gods, and what it means to be a
priest...

14045.「さあ…… 帰ろう。\n キリカ修道会の皆が 待っている。:
...Let us return. The Kirika Order is waiting
for us.

14047.「おお……よく 無事に帰ってくれました。 \n これで 二度と 死神の息吹が\n:
Ohh... thank goodness you've returned
unharmed. The Reaper's Breath will never again
return to plague this world.

14049.「これは 大僧侶キリカが残した 僧侶の証です。\n あなたが持つに ふさわしいも:
This is the Proof of PRI handed down by High
Priest Kirika. You deserve to have it. Please
accept it.

14050.「これは 大僧侶キリカが残した品です。\n あなたが持つに ふさわしいものでしょ:
This was handed down by High Priest Kirika.
You deserve to have it. Please accept it.

14051.「あなたは 本当の僧侶の道を教えてくれました。\n 私たちは この教えを\n 永:
You have taught us all the way of a true
priest. Let us never forget these teachings.

14053.「お前は もう私の弟子ではない。\n そのチカラも 心も……\n 私は お前に:
You are no longer my pupil... you have
surpassed me in both strength and in heart.

14054.「これからは 修道会を出て\n 自分のチカラで 高みを目指せ。\n お前は さら:
As you leave this monastery, aim for ever
greater heights with your strength. I know you
will become an even greater priest.

14055.「私は これからは もっと\n アルノーのそばに いてやるつもりだ。:
I intend to spend more time with Arnoud from
now on.

14056.「ありがとう <pc>。\n お前のことは 決して 忘れない。\n いつか また:
Thank you, <pc>. I will never
forget you. I hope we will meet again someday!

32319.「ボクね お母さんと ひさしぶりに\n お父さんの お墓参りに行ったの。\n う:
My mom and I went to visit dad's grave for the
first time in a while. We walked a long way,
and I'm really tired.

32320.<if_woman>「これからは お母さんと\n 世界中の いろんな所をまわるん:
<if_woman>From now on, I'm going to travel the world
with mom. We're going on a journey just like
you, Ms. <pc>!<else>From now on, I'm going to travel the world
with mom. We're going on a journey just like
you, Mr. <pc>!
<endif>
